publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3090 Pauline McNeill: The Act of Settlement—That the Parliament welcomes the fact that Lord Chancellor and Secretary of State for Justice Jack Straw MP is looking to change the Act of Settlement 1701; strongly believes that it is wrong to have a settled constitutional position that discriminates against any section of the population, and further believes that the Act is outdated and does not fit with multicultural life in a modern society.

S3M-3090 Pauline McNeill: The Act of Settlement—That the Parliament welcomes the fact that Lord Chancellor and Secretary of State for Justice Jack Straw MP is looking to change the Act of Settlement 1701; strongly believes that it is wrong to have a settled constitutional position that discriminates against any section of the population, and further believes that the Act is outdated and does not fit with multicultural life in a modern society. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell*, Margaret Curran*, Elaine Murray*, Trish Godman*, Michael McMahon*, Ken Macintosh*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Kidd*, Andy Kerr*, Rhona Brankin*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Jackie Baillie*, Brian Adam*, Marilyn Livingstone*, John Scott*, Hugh Henry*, David Whitton*, Patricia Ferguson*, Malcolm Chisholm*

S3M-3090 Pauline McNeill: The Act of Settlement—That the Parliament welcomes the fact that Lord Chancellor and Secretary of State for Justice Jack Straw MP is looking to change the Act of Settlement 1701; strongly believes that it is wrong to have a settled constitutional position that discriminates against any section of the population, and further believes that the Act is outdated and does not fit with multicultural life in a modern society. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell, Margaret Curran, Elaine Murray, Trish Godman, Michael McMahon, Ken Macintosh, Jamie Hepburn, Bill Kidd, Andy Kerr, Rhona Brankin, Ms Wendy Alexander, Jackie Baillie, Brian Adam, Marilyn Livingstone, John Scott, Hugh Henry, David Whitton, Patricia Ferguson, Malcolm Chisholm, Dr Richard Simpson*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-3090 The Act of Settlement (lodged on 10 December 2008) Sandra White*
S3M-3090 The Act of Settlement (lodged on 10 December 2008) Tom McCabe*
